title: #117 Vanderpump Rules Recap -- Kristen Hits The Floor of So-Vain with Special Guest Simon Curtis
itunes:title: #117 Vanderpump Rules Recap -- Kristen Hits The Floor of So-Vain with Special Guest Simon Curtis
itunes:subtitle: Danny is joined by singer/writer Simon Curtis to recap this week's Vanderpump Rules, where Kristen continues a downward spiral in Solvang, the men have a guys night in West Hollywood, and Stassi drops a bombshell.Simon Curtis/Pump Rules Recap: ...
description:
Danny is joined by singer/writer Simon Curtis to recap this week's Vanderpump Rules, where Kristen continues a downward spiral in Solvang, the men have a guys night in West Hollywood, and Stassi drops a bombshell.


Simon Curtis/Pump Rules Recap: 3:23ish


*To support this pod, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic

LINKS:
